html:
that day. This is our day, or the last days (2:12).

remnant of Israel/escaped of…Jacob. Those who escape God's judgments (because of their righteousness) at the last days (4:2).

lean/him that smote them. The remnant of Israel will no longer lean on the rod (Assyria) that smote them (2 Kgs. 16:7), but they will lean on or trust the rod (Jehovah) that enabled them to flee safely from Egypt of old.
